clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Treatment Patterns and Outcomes in Participants With Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2)-Positive Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Disease Registry Study to Prospectively Observe Treatment Patterns and Outcomes in Patients With HER2-Positive Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This disease registry is a prospective, multicenter non-interventional study designed to observe anti-cancer treatment regimens and clinical outcomes in participants with HER2-positive unresectable locally advanced breast cancer (LABC) or metastatic breast cancer (MBC).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Receiving Each Unique Treatment Regimen Overall
Percentage of Participants Receiving Each Unique Treatment Regimen as First-Line Versus Subsequent-Line Therapy
Percentage of Participants Receiving Each Unique Treatment Regimen Sequence

primary_outcome.time_frame: From start date of anti-cancer treatment regimen to the date of either disease progression or death (up to approximately 8 years)
primary_outcome.description: Tumor response will be evaluated by the Investigator according to site-/country-specific medical practice. Study protocol does not specify any particular method of assessment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious AEs (SAEs)
Percentage of Participants Receiving Each Treatment Regimen, by Participant Characteristics
Percentage of Participants Receiving Each Treatment Regimen, by Country/Region
Overall Survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the date of initiation of treatment to the date of death from any cause (up to approximately 8 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Treatment Regimens Received
Percentage of Participants With Complete Response (CR) or Partial Response (PR) - Objective Response Rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the date of initiation of treatment to the date of disease progression or death from any cause (up to approximately 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Tumor response will be evaluated by the Investigator according to site-/country-specific medical practice. Study protocol does not specify any particular method of assessment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first response (CR or PR) to the date of disease progression (up to approximately 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Tumor response will be evaluated by the Investigator according to site-/country-specific medical practice. Study protocol does not specify any particular method of assessment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants by Reasons for Treatment Modification
EuroQoL 5-Dimension 5-Level Questionnaire (EQ-5D-5L) Score
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Breast (FACT-B) Questionnaire Score
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment-General Health (WPAI-GH) Questionnaire Score
Percentage of Participants With HER2 Retesting
Percentage of Participants With HER2 Overexpression, as Assessed Using In Situ Hybridization or Immunohistochemistry
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Total Healthcare Cost
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Percentage of Participants Who Are Hospitalized
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Length of Hospitalization
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Percentage of Participants With Emergency Room Visit
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Percentage of Participants With Outpatient Visit
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Cost of Disease Related Out-of-Pocket Healthcare Expenditures
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Indirect Disease Related Cost
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Number of Working Hours Missed Among Informal Caregivers due to Disease-Related Caregiving Responsibilities
Healthcare Resource Utilization - Percentage of Participants Receiving Monetary Social Benefits

arm_group.description: Enrolled participants will receive treatment and clinical assessments for their HER2-positive unresectable LABC/MBC as determined by their treating physician, according to the standard of care and routine clinical practice at each site. Participants will be followed until death, withdrawal of consent or study termination, whichever occurs first. Study protocol does not specify any particular drug or treatment regimen.

study_pop.textblock: Disease registry data will be collected among participants with HER2-positive unresectable LABC or MBC.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of HER2-positive unresectable LABC or MBC within 6 months prior to enrollment
Exclusion Criteria:
- None specified
